effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 826,486 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 322,162.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Skyscorcher Pauldrons
description: For all your radiation dampening needs.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,355, up to 11,776.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.6 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
